item.description:
Please join us for an urban gardening workshop at Elizabeth's home in Newburyport! She has recently gone carless and we'll use the former parking spot in her driveway to build and plant an urban container garden.

This will be an excellent workshop for those with limited space who would like to grow fruits, vegetables, herbs and flowers.  It will be a hands-on experience or just come prepared to ask questions and take notes. We'll also talk about how to install a rain barrel to provide water for the garden.

This workshop will start at 1PM and should be finished by 4PM.

Suggested donation of $5-$15 to help cover meetup costs.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in front of the house.
item.why: People with limited space can learn how to grow a surprising amount of food.
item.name: Vegetable Container Garden in the City
